9b9389167bf5b213ad08bb923b791da0.description: Method `new_array` has 8 arguments (exceeds 4 allowed). Consider refactoring.

a7d73ac337d058ad2299c21c5df0dfcc.description: Avoid parameter lists longer than 5 parameters. [8/5]

content.body:
This cop checks for methods with too many parameters.
The maximum number of parameters is configurable.
Keyword arguments can optionally be excluded from the total count.
